name: Half-Orc Race Traits
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits

sections.body: You have enough human features that it's easy for you to pass for a pureblooded human. You gain a +4 trait bonus on Disguise checks to pass as human, and Disguise is always a class skill for you.
sections.name: Almost Human
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Almost Human

sections.body: You have worked for a crime lord, either as a low-level enforcer or as a guard, and are adept at frightening away people. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Intimidate checks, and Intimidate is always a class skill for you.
sections.name: Brute
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Brute

sections.body: Driven from town after town because of your heritage, you have become adept at living apart from others. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Survival skill checks, and Survival is always a class skill for you.
sections.name: Outcast
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Outcast

sections.body: A childhood spent scrabbling for every possession and scrap of food has made you fierce and wary. You receive a +1 trait bonus on all Intimidate checks made to demoralize opponents and a +1 trait bonus on all Perception checks to avoid being surprised.
sections.name: Scrapper
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Scrapper
